metadata.description: A kiosk is a place to have a rest, to enjoy, to talk... But it is also a watchtower from where one may stare at the world. Every morning, the roller blind is raised as a hope and a sash is drawn up. This is the small tragedy of a tiny hero, his private adventure in a world that seems to ignore his existence. a lonely person that observes how life keeps on going, without stopping in front of him.
metadata.name: Kiosco
